price: 30. Eh mabe ezali likolo ya bawumbu! Motindami atikala koyela bango te sé batióla ye.
arabic: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāḥasratan ʿalā al-ʿibādi mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
